title: Teddy bears at play [1959]
creator_credit: Winifred Lade, Mel F. Nichols and Australian National Travel Association
brief_description: A re-issue of a 1939 film, famous for its intimate study of the koala. This quaint and friendly creature with its soft round furry body is the most popular of Austrlia’s unique animals. Photographed by Mel. F. Nichols, edited by Winifred Lade.
creator_credit_for_label: Winifred Lade, Mel F. Nichols and Australian National Travel Association
